resources.string: Forgot your password, huh? How embarrassingâ€¦
Don\'t worry. It happens to the best of us. Well, I mean, not me, but other people. People like you.

Promise you aren\'t trying to break into an account that isn\'t yours? Of course you do. Okay, then we\'ll hook you up. If an account exists for the email address you gave, we\'ll email you a temporary reset code.
Keep in mind that this won\'t protect your account if the forces of evil have access to your email too. Probably shouldn\'t use the same password for both, but we both know you do anyways.
